channel.title: Dictionary of Kink Terminology :: Safety Third
channel.description: General Terms Service (Role) or Service-Type Any individual that takes on a role (top/bottom, dom/sub, etc.) for the benefit of another. Note: Motivations for being a Service-Type varies between individuals, although general consensus is that they find enjoyment in being able to provide the service, and not directly from the act itself. Kink Relationship Dynamics Power Exchange Negotiated power imbalance, sometimes referred to as Authority Transfer.

item.title: Downloads
item.description: The page for downloading the contents of this chapter in other formats.
